==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=无法无天}}

===Etymology===
From
* {{zh-l|無|not have}} + {{zh-l|法}} (short for {{zh-l|法紀|law}}): ("no (respect for) law") +
* {{zh-l|無|not have}} + {{zh-l|天}} (short for {{zh-l|天理|heavenly justice}}.

Literally "no (respect for) heaven(ly) justice".

}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# no respect for law and order; unruly
